abstract: Defense rests in fraud trial of former Dewey & LeBoeuf executives Steven H Davis, Stephen DiCarmine and Joel Sanders; they are accused of using accounting gimmicks at defunct law firm.
lead_paragraph: The defense plans to formally rest its case on Tuesday without calling a single witness to testify in the trial, which began in late May.

headline.main: Defense to Rest in Trial of 3 Ex-Dewey & LeBoeuf Leaders
headline.print_headline: Defense to Rest in Trial of Dewey & LeBoeuf Leaders

snippet: The defense plans to formally rest its case on Tuesday without calling a single witness to testify in the trial, which began in late May.
